entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of snow late in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
